vision.voltsofdoom.coresystem.universal.main

Class VoltsOfDoomCoreSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • vision.voltsofdoom.coresystem.universal.main.VoltsOfDoomCoreSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class VoltsOfDoomCoreSystem
extends java.lang.Thread
    The main class for Volts of Doom's Core System. The game starts running here. In the case that you need it, the game should be run from main(String[]). The arguments can be passed either from the runner (e.g. command line arguments), or from the voltsofdoom/config.json file, which can be easily read using getVMArgs().
    Author:
    GenElectrovise
